post.title: please help panasonic th-50phd6 not turning on, no blinking lights
post.content: ok, i have a panasonic th-50phd6 and it is not turning on. i push the power button and the led turns green, and i hear about 4 clicks and the fan starts to spin up, but shuts off, and the picture never comes up, the led stays green. i don't getting any blinking lights like other problems i've read about here in the forum. somebody please help.
